articles.author: F1
articles.title: 'Bono’ explains hard work behind Hamilton's Silverstone win - Formula 1
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton’s long-time race engineer Peter ‘Bono’ Bonnington has revealed his emotions at the seven-time world champion’s victory at Silverstone, a win that marked Hamilton’s first since the 2021 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.content: The engineer went on to detail the extensive journey behind the victory, adding: Its an emotional one. Its been a long, long time, and he and I have been working hard trying to get back there. Baby s… [+949 chars]
